simulator_config.title: Simulator Configuration
simulator_config.description: Select a simulation configuration and optionally set a custom start time. {config_count} configurations available.

data_description.simulation_config: Choose a simulation configuration that defines circuit templates and energy profiles
data_description.host: Custom serial number for the simulated panel (optional, will use config default if empty)
data_description.simulation_start_time: Time format: HH:MM (24h), H:MM (12h), or full ISO datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Leave empty to use current time.
data_description.entity_naming_pattern: Choose how circuit entities are named in the simulation

data_description.enable_panel_net_energy_sensors: Create net energy sensors for panel-level energy flows (main meter and feed-through). Shows true energy balance accounting for bidirectional flows.
data_description.enable_circuit_net_energy_sensors: Create net energy sensors for individual circuits. Shows true energy consumption accounting for reactive power and regenerative flows.

entity_naming_options.title: Entity Naming Options
entity_naming_options.description: Configure how entity IDs are named. Choose between friendly names (e.g., kitchen_outlets_power) or circuit tab numbers (e.g., circuit_15_power).

data.legacy_upgrade_to_friendly: Upgrade Legacy Installation to Friendly Names

data_description.legacy_upgrade_to_friendly: Upgrade this legacy installation to use friendly entity names with device prefix. This will rename all existing entities.
data_description.entity_naming_pattern: Choose how entity IDs are constructed. Friendly names use circuit names (e.g., kitchen_outlets_power), while circuit numbers use tab positions (e.g., circuit_15_power).

simulation_start_time.title: Simulation Start Time
simulation_start_time.description: Configure the simulation start time. Changes to simulation time will reload the integration to apply the new time.

data_description.simulation_start_time: Time format: HH:MM (24h), H:MM (12h), or full ISO datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS). Leave empty to use current time. Integration will reload to apply changes.

simulation_offline_minutes.title: Simulation Offline Minutes
simulation_offline_minutes.description: Configure how long the panel should appear offline during simulation.

data_description.simulation_offline_minutes: Number of minutes the panel should appear offline during simulation. Set to 0 to disable offline simulation.

export_config.title: Export Synthetic Sensor Config
export_config.description: Export the current synthetic sensor configuration to a YAML file. You can specify either a directory (file will be named automatically) or a full file path. Default filename: {filename}

data_description.directory: Either a directory path (file will be named automatically) or a full file path ending in .yaml where the configuration will be saved.
